contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=January 2013}} [[File:Gare Houilles 4.JPG|thumb|Platforms]] '''Houilles – Carrières-sur-Seine''' is a railway station in suburban [[Paris]]. It is situated on the [[Paris–Le Havre railway]]. Trains arrive at the station from [[Gare Saint-Lazare]] and the [[RER A|RER]]. {{s-start}} {{s-rail|title=SNCF}} {{s-line|system=Transilien|line=J|previous=Saint-Lazare|next=Poissy|type=C|type2=V}} {{s-line|system=Transilien|line=L|previous=Nanterre-Université|next=Sartrouville|type2=C}} {{s-line|system=RER|line=A|previous=Sartrouville|next=Nanterre-Préfecture|type=a3a5|type2=A4}} {{s-end}} ==See also== {{commons category|Gare de Houilles - Carrières-sur-Seine}} * [[List of stations of the Paris RER]] {{coord|48.921|N|2.184|E|display=title|source:nlwiki}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Houilles}} [[Category:Railway stations in Île-de-France]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Yvelines]] {{IledeFrance-railstation-stub}}
